            by = c("season",
                   "week",

  filter(is.na(qb_adv) == F) %>%
  filter(fake_id = ifelse(home_away == "home",
                          paste(season, week, team, opponent,
                                sep = "_"),
                          paste(season, week, opponent, team,
                                sep = "_")))
